sentences.cn: 不管怎样, 这是你的钱包.

sentences.en: Chiang Mai restaurants cater to every palate and pocketbook.
sentences.cn: 清迈有适合各种各样口味和各种消费层次的餐馆.

sentences.en: My dictionary is a slim pocketbook.
sentences.cn: 我的字典是一部极薄的袖珍字典.

sentences.en: Older voters are most concerned about pocketbook issues (= that concern money ) .
sentences.cn: 年纪较大的选民最关心钱的问题。

sentences.en: Poor service affected the waiters pocketbook.
sentences.cn: “差劲”的服务影响了侍者的收入.
差劲的服务影响了侍者的收入.

sentences.en: She had several large bills in her pocketbook.
sentences.cn: 她钱袋里有几张大面额钞票.

sentences.en: She pulled off her gloves and tucked them into her pocketbook.
sentences.cn: 她取下了她的手套,把它们塞进了口袋里.

sentences.en: Take care of your health, your heart and your pocketbook.
sentences.cn: 天秤座:注意自己的健康 、 心脏和钱袋.

sentences.en: Take notes of any newly learned English expression in a personal pocketbook.
sentences.cn: 把所有新学到的英语用语记在个人的小册子里.

sentences.en: That car is too expensive for my pocketbook.
The aim was to provide a car for every age and pocketbook .
sentences.cn: 目标是为每个年龄层和收入层的人士提供汽车。

sentences.en: The man who called today with a story of having lost his pocketbook, was Jeremy Diddler.
sentences.cn: 今天来访的那位声称自己钱包丢失的是个骗子.

sentences.en: The thief pinched her pocketbook and ran.
sentences.cn: 这个小偷偷了她的手提包,然后跑了.

sentences.en: Two, he said, strapping and stowing his pocketbook away.
sentences.cn: “两镑, ”他说着, 把皮夹子扎上,收了起来.

sentences.en: We read about the Easter Egg Hunt in the pocketbook.
sentences.cn: 我们阅读了故事小书上的这一则:复活节-寻蛋游戏.

sentences.en: You're about to touch a number of doctors on their tenderest nerve - the pocketbook.
sentences.cn: 你即将去碰触许多大夫神经最脆弱的地方 - 他们的钱包.

words.tran_cn: 钱包；笔记本；经济来源；皮夹

trans.tran_cn: 皮夹，小本子，女用钱袋，<美>必须花费的钱
trans.tran_en: the amount of money that you have, or your ability to pay for things
